Name: Aster
Notes: Primary cosmic goddess, catgirl creatrix with bow and red thread, seeking to reunite with Andromeda

Name: Andromeda
Notes: Companion goddess with bow and blue thread, trying to reach Aster across cosmic space

Name: Triangulum
Notes: Cosmic entity gathering green threads to help unite the red and blue strings of Aster and Andromeda

Name: Magellanic clouds
Notes: Cosmic entities working with Triangulum to weave the bond between Aster and Andromeda

Name: Sagittarius
Notes: Constellation/cosmic region, part of the hope for cosmic reunion

Name: Princess
Notes: Celestial entity, likely Andromeda constellation, part of the cosmic love story

Name: Milkdromeda
Notes: Future unified cosmic entity, the result of Aster and Andromeda's eventual reunion
